bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Synchrophasor Data Transfer for Power Systems
IEEE Draft Standard for Synchrophasor Data Transfer for Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines a method for exchange of synchronized phasor measurement data between power system equipment. It specifies messaging including types, use, contents, and data formats for real-time communication between Phasor Measurement Units (PMU), Phasor Data Concentrators (PDC), and other applications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
